result.title: ACM-ICPC training camps in spring 2017
result.content: Recently my team got an invitation to an ICPC training camp in spring: http://in.harbour.space/icpc/. However the participation fee would be 1270â‚¬ per person which is really high compared to standard Russian training camps. I'm asking if someone knows what other ICPC training camps are going to be held in spring and what are the dates for them? The Petrozavodsk winter camp is usually held in January/February but that would overlap with the Barcelona camp.
